blogs.title: New Features
blogs.body:
Change UI

Duplicate author name 

Login/Signup Feature

Linking to some real database or cache of browser

Using some api to make "writing blog box" featurable
(at least give it a feature to upload image)

Editing the blog made already

Something unique feature
